author: jhgoh
body:
GenParticles2HepMCConverter is crashing during the NanoAOD production, for particle gun samples.
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/prep-ops/4965.html

PDF and incident beams are absent in the particle gun samples, but the module is written assuming their existence in the event.
This PR protects crashing by checking null pointer, and add incident dummy proton pair if incident partons could not be catched.
title: GenParticles2HepMCConverter null pointer protection
